entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 17 this afternoon. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill minus 17 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 11 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
